name: 劉世芸
objective:
本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

Textbook: Select Reading (intermediate)
schedule:
w1: orientation (the practice of four skills; explain how memory works in learning a language)
w2: Chapter 1 ( A long walk home) 
w3: (continued)     plus: use of past perfect tense 
w4: Chapter 3 (Culture Shock) 
w5: (cont.)         plus: used to, get used to, be used to 
                          skills of topic and main idea in a text 
w6: Chapter 4 (A Young, blind Whiz) 
w7: (cont.)         plus: skill of inferencing; reduced clauses 
w8: review 
w9: mid-term exam
w10: Chapter 5 (Pop group's use of folk song stirs debate)
w11: (cont.)        plus: use of present perfect tense; skill of 
                          scanning 
w12: Chapter 7 ( Private lives) 
w13: (cont.)        plus: skill of guessing meaning; the use 
                          of past tense 
w14: Chapter 10 (Out to lunch) 
w15: (cont.)        plus: use of infinitive form 
w16: Chapter 11 (Public Attitudes toward science) 
w17: (cont.)        plus: use of passive voice
w18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance / Q&A / Tests: 40% 
Mid-term exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: collection of articles in form of handout
